name: Dodplat
description:
Dodplat is a simple, endless game about making your way through a room of traps that activate on a timer. This is the first game I made while learning Unity development, maybe it can become a much bigger game in the future.

Controls:

  • ASDW or Arrow Keys = Press to move in the four directions
  • Space Bar = Hold to show you the finish line of the level

Tutorial:

  • Red platforms send you back to the beggining of the level
  • Conveyor belts push you to the platform they are pointing at
  • Boxes block your movement for a limited time
  • Portals send you to another random portal
